messages.id: Function to add NixOs support is not yet implemented
messages.message: Function to add NixOS support is not yet implemented
messages.translation: Der NixOS Support wurde noch nicht hinzugefügt

messages.id: What's the Name of the WebApp?
messages.message: What's the Name of the WebApp?

messages.id: What's the URL of the WebApp?
messages.message: What's the URL of the WebApp?
messages.translation: Was ist die URL der WebApp?

messages.id: 2: Make the Desktop entry systemwide available (Default is false)
messages.message: 2: Make the Desktop entry systemwide available (Default is false)

messages.id: 3: In which Directory should all WebApps go in? ATTENTION: This Directory has to exist, otherwise the Program will not work correctly (Default is ~/WebApps)
messages.message: 3: In which Directory should all WebApps go in? ATTENTION: This Directory has to exist, otherwise the Program will not work correctly (Default is ~/WebApps)
messages.translation: 3: In welchem Verzeichnis sollen wir die WebApps erstellen? Achtung: Das Verzeichniss muss existieren, sonst wird das Program nicht korrekt funktioniert (Standardmäßig: ~/WebApps)

messages.id: 5: Change SpecialOS, you can only choose between NixOS and none
messages.message: 5: Change SpecialOS, you can only choose between NixOS and none
messages.translation: 5: Ändere SpecialOS, du kannst nur NixOS oder none auswählen

messages.id: Type the Number of the Config you want to change or type 'done' if everything is set correctly
messages.message: Type the Number of the Config you want to change or type 'done' if everything is set correctly
messages.translation: Tippe die Nummer, von der Einstellung, die du ändern möchtest oder schreibe 'done', wenn du alles eingestellt hast

messages.id: Changed now Generate Desktop file to False
messages.message: Changed now Generate Desktop file to False

messages.id: Changed now Generate Desktop file to True
messages.message: Changed now Generate Desktop file to True

messages.id: Changed now Systemwide Desktop file to False
messages.message: Changed now Systemwide Desktop file to False
messages.translation: Generiere Systemweiten .desktop file ist jetzt aus

messages.id: Changed now Systemwide Desktop file to True
messages.message: Changed now Systemwide Desktop file to True
messages.translation: Generiere Systemweiten .desktop File ist jetzt an

messages.id: Please type the Directory where the WebApps should be created
messages.message: Please type the Directory where the WebApps should be created
messages.translation: Tippe das Verzeichnis ein, wo die WebApps erstellt werden sollen
